events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the tracking status hasn’t updated and my package is late. Can you help?
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's report about late shipping and tracking problems.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery inquiry for the customer.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out about your order delay, I’m here to help get this sorted for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can track your package more accurately?
Sure, my order number is #123456789 and the shipping address is 789 Elm Street, Springfield, IL.
I’ve checked the tracking system, and it seems there is a delay due to weather conditions. Your package should arrive within the next 3 days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Thanks for the update. I understand the weather issues, but would appreciate if you could notify me as soon as it ships.
Absolutely, I’ve set up notifications on your order and you will receive an update immediately once it ships.
Hi again! Your package has now shipped and is expected to be delivered tomorrow. Let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case as your delivery has been updated and expected soon. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our short satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
